channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- Remote Full Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- Remote Full Client

item.title: CVE-2024-7481|2024-09-25T10:33:12.452Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature during installation of a Printer driver via the TeamViewer_service.exe component of TeamViewer Remote Clients prior version 15.58.4 for Windows allows an attacker with local unprivileged access on a Windows system to elevate their privileges and install drivers.

item.title: CVE-2024-7479|2024-09-25T10:34:08.097Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature during installation of a VPN driver via the TeamViewer_service.exe component of TeamViewer Remote Clients prior version 15.58.4 for Windows allows an attacker with local unprivileged access on a Windows system to elevate their privileges and install drivers.
